    canPassGiratoryMechanism(GiratoryMechanism) - Method in class engine.gameCharacters.mummys.Mummy

    canPassGiratoryMechanism(GiratoryMechanism) - Method in class engine.gameCharacters.player.Player
    El player podra pasar por una puerta giratoria dependiendo la posicion del mismo y la de orientaci de la puerta giratoria.

    checkChangeStatus() - Method in class engine.gameCharacters.abstractGameCharacter.GameCharacterStateFalling
    Si hay un cambio de estado, Dispara el evento: Game.getInstance().eventFired(KVEventListener.CHARACTER_END_FALL, this.gameCharacter);
    Llama a super.checkChangeStatus();
    checkChangeStatus() - Method in class engine.gameCharacters.abstractGameCharacter.GameCharacterStateJumping
    Si hay un cambio de estado, Dispara el evento: Game.getInstance().eventFired(KVEventListener.CHARACTER_END_JUMP, this.gameCharacter);
    Llama a super.checkChangeStatus();
    checkChangeStatus() - Method in class engine.gameCharacters.abstractGameCharacter.GameCharacterStateOnAir
    En caso de tocar el suelo pasara a estado GameCharacterStateIddle, o GameCharacterStateWalking
    checkChangeStatus() - Method in class engine.gameCharacters.abstractGameCharacter.GameCharacterStateOnFloor
     
    checkChangeStatus() - Method in class engine.gameCharacters.abstractGameCharacter.GameCharacterStateOnStair
    Si hay un cambio de estado, Dispara el evento: Game.getInstance().eventFired(KVEventListener.CHARACTER_EXIT_STAIR, this.gameCharacter);
    Llama a this.gameCharacter.gameCharacterState = new GameCharacterStateWalking(this.gameCharacter); (AL salir de una escalera solo se puede pasar a modo caminata)

    checkPushLever(Player) - Method in class engine.level.door.DoorStateClosed
    Si el player activa la palanca se realiza el cambio de estado mediante this.door.doorState = new DoorStateOpening(this.door);
    checkPushLever(Player) - Method in class engine.level.door.DoorStateClosing
    Se sobreescribe como metodo vacio (no hace nada)
    checkPushLever(Player) - Method in class engine.level.door.DoorStateHide
    Se sobreescribe como metodo vacio (no hace nada)
    checkPushLever(Player) - Method in class engine.level.door.DoorStateOpen
    Si el player activa la palanca se realiza el cambio de estado mediante this.door.doorState =new DoorStateClosing(this.door);
    checkPushLever(Player) - Method in class engine.level.door.DoorStateOpening
    Se sobreescribe como metodo vacio (no hace nada)
